TerminationNotice: Be aware, you have termination options enabled that might cancel your loops early
RequiresVNavmesh:
AutoDuty Requires VNavmesh plugin to be Installed and Loaded
Please add 3rd party repo:
https://puni.sh/api/repository/veyn
RequiresBossMod:
AutoDuty Requires BossMod plugin to be Installed and Loaded
Please add 3rd party repo:
https://puni.sh/api/repository/veyn
RequiresRotation: AutoDuty Requires a Rotation plugin to be Installed and Loaded (Either Wrath Combo, Rotation Solver Reborn, or BossMod AutoRotation)
ErrorSelectVersion:
You must select a version
of the dungeon to run
ErrorNotInParty: You must not be in a party to run Support, Squadron or Trust
ErrorGroupOf4: You must be in a group of 4 to run Regular Duties
ErrorPartyMakeup: You must have the correct party makeup to run Regular Duties
LevelingModeHelpTrust:
GROUP will level your trust members equally.
SOLO will only level them as much as needed
SwitchCombatJob: Please switch to a combat job to use AutoDuty.
BlueMageRestriction: Blue Mage cannot run Trust, Duty Support, Squadron or Variant dungeons. Please switch jobs or select a different category.
SelectSupportTrust:
Please select one of Support, Trust, Squadron or Regular
to Populate the Duty List
RequiresVNavmeshAlt:
AutoDuty requires vnavmesh plugin to be installed and loaded for proper navigation and movement. Please add 3rd party repo:
https://puni.sh/api/repository/veyn
RequiresBossModAlt:
AutoDuty requires BossMod plugin to be installed and loaded for proper mechanic handling. Please add 3rd party repo:
https://puni.sh/api/repository/veyn
